page.title: 06SERVICES
page.content: The villages contain one POST OFFICE and STORE,one GENERAL STORE, one small GARAGE and STORE.The firm W.H.Cutting and Son has a CAR SHOWROOM and LARGE WORKSHOP.There are two PUBLIC HOUSES, THE WHEATSHEAF and PRINCESS VICTORIA. Although many homes now have their own telephone there are three PUBLIC TELEPHONES.There is ELECTRICITY IN THE VILLAGE (but few street lights).There is no GAS supply and no MAIN DRAINS. Sewage is collected in SEPTIC TANKS which have to be emptied about twice a year.There are very few FOOTPATHS in the village.
